title: 'Hide Packages From Husband': Delivery Guy Takes Woman's Doormat Instruction A Bit Seriously
text:
Who goes to a mall or a shop to buy things nowadays? When things are just a click away then there is no need to step outside the house.

But with things becoming that easy to order, we have developed this habit of ordering just anything and everything. Maybe that’s why this woman hides her packages from her husband and even has a special instruction for the delivery guys written on her doormat.

Her doormat reads, ‘Please hide packages from husband’. So when a delivery guy came to deliver a package to their home, he hid the package under the doormat, however, it was clearly visible, but he still tried his best to hide it, which obviously proved that the delivery guy had a good sense of humour.

Take a look at the package:





‘Oh my god look! The UPS guy actually hid it under the rug!’ Freeman wrote while tagging her friend Amanda Harper, from California, who gifted her the mat. "I instantly laughed and the first thing I did was send [a picture] to Amanda before posting it on Facebook," Freeman told Good Morning America.

Ebony also said that she has one online package daily, but her husband doesn’t really gets upset. As expected the post went viral in no time and garnered 49k shares and 10k comments.
